summary: Initializes the CuPy package by importing and exposing a comprehensive set of GPU-accelerated array operations, mathematical functions, linear algebra, FFT, random number generation, sparse matrix support, and related utilities, while also providing helper routines for type handling, memory pool access, and configuration display.
business_intent: Offer a drop-in, NumPyâ€‘compatible library that leverages CUDA GPUs to accelerate scientific and numerical computing workloads, allowing developers to run existing NumPy code on GPUs with minimal modifications.
